original_text: And if thou offer a meat offering of thy firstfruits unto the Lord, thou shalt offer for the meat offering of thy firstfruits green ears of corn dried by the fire, even corn beaten out of full ears.
korean_text: 너는 첫 이삭의 소제를 여호와께 드리거든 첫 이삭을 볶아 찧은 것으로 네 소제를 삼되

sentences.original_text: And if thou offer a meat offering of thy firstfruits unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 네 첫 열매의 소제를 주께 드린다면

sentences.original_text: thou shalt offer for the meat offering of thy firstfruits
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 첫 열매의 소제를 위해 드려야 한다

sentences.original_text: green ears of corn dried by the fire
even corn beaten out of full ears
